page.title: 03POTTEN END-THE ALFORD ARMS.
page.content:
POTTEN END HAS TWO PUBS, ONE OF WHICH IS INDEPENDANT BY HAVING IT'S OWN BREWERY. THIS PUB, THE ALFORD ARMS WAS BUILT 100 YEARS AGO AS A SMALL LOCAL PUB. THE LANLORD,MR WINSHIP IS ALSO SUPPLIED WITH BEER FROM WHITBREAD BREWERY.
MR WINSHIP MAKES 'CHERRYPICKERS' AT 86p A PINT,'PICKLEDSQUELS' AT 94p A PINT,'RUDOLPH'S REVENGE' AT Â£1.00 A PINT AND 'ALEXANDER THE GREAT' AT Â£1.04 A PINT.
THE OPENING TIMES ARE 1100 - 1430 AND 1800 - 0100 BUT ON A SUNDAY THEY ARE 1200 - 1400 AND 1900 - 2230.
THEY PLAY TRADITIONAL GAMES SUCH AS DARTS, DOMINOES, SHOVE HAIPENNY AND IN THE SUMMER, MORRIS DANCING, WHICH IS AN OLD ENGLISH FOLK DANCE.
